properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: JWT secret key for signing tokens

properties.name: app.jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT access token expiration time in milliseconds

properties.name: app.jwt.refresh-expiration
properties.description: JWT refresh token expiration time in milliseconds

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: List of allowed origins for CORS

properties.name: app.uploads.public-base
properties.description: Public base URL for serving uploaded files
